p.k: Brooklyn Funk Essentials mix jazz, funk, and hip-hop featuring musicians and poets from different cultures. This performance is in the beautiful antique theatre of Vienne. Enjoy this extremely funky and energetic show that makes the crowd go wild!
p.d: Music collective Brooklyn Funk Essentials mixes jazz, funk and hip-hop featuring musicians and poets from different cultures. The band was conceived in 1993 by producer Arthur Baker and bassist and musical director Lati Kronlund. By the mid-1990s, the group became a staple of New York City's club scene. During this performance in the beautiful antique theatre of Vienne in France, they give an extremely funky and energetic show that makes the crowd go wild!
